item.title: bookdown, My Process
item.description: tl;dr I just self-published a book-length version of my project [Statistical Rethinking with brms, ggplot2, and the tidyverse](https://bookdown.org/connect/#/apps/1850/access. By using Yihui Xie’s bookdown package, I was able to do that for free. If you’ve never heard of it, bookdown enables R users to write books and other long-form articles with R Markdown. You can save your bookdown products in a variety of formats (e.g., PDF, HTML) and publish them in several ways, too.
